languages.text: {n}...хотели бы вы сказать. Однако чужая воля заставляет вас произнести совсем другое:{/n} "Это изначально был план Леди Теодоры. Она... ее слуги... всегда сообщали мне, где будет следующая атака темных эльдаров".

traits.locale_text: {n}...хотели бы вы сказать. Однако чужая воля заставляет вас произнести совсем другое:{/n} "Это изначально был план Леди Теодоры. Она... всегда говорила мне, где будет следующая атака той горстки темных эльдар, что нам докучала".

languages.text: {n}...Or at least, that is what you wanted to say. However, the alien will makes you say something else entirely:{/n} "It was originally Lady Theodora's plan. She... her servants... always let me know where the next Drukhari attack would take place."
languages.original_text: {n}...хотели бы вы сказать. Однако чужая воля заставляет вас произнести совсем другое:{/n} "Это изначально был план Леди Теодоры. Она... ее слуги... всегда сообщали мне, где будет следующая атака темных эльдаров".

traits.locale_text: {n}...Or at least, this is what you wanted to say. However, the alien will makes you say something else entirely:{/n} "It was originally Lady Theodora's plan. She... her servants... always let me know where the next Drukhari attack would take place."

{n}...Or at least, that is what you wanted to say. However, the alien will makes you say something else entirely:{/n} "It was originally Lady Theodora's plan. She... her servants... always let me know where the next Drukhari attack would take place."

languages.text: {n}... Ou du moins, tels sont les mots que vous vouliez prononcer. Mais la volonté étrangère qui vous habite vous fait dire toute autre chose :{/n} « C'était le projet de dame Théodora à l'origine. Elle... ses serviteurs... me faisaient toujours savoir à l'avance où se déroulerait la prochaine attaque des Drukharis. »
languages.original_text: {n}...Or at least, that is what you wanted to say. However, the alien will makes you say something else entirely:{/n} "It was originally Lady Theodora's plan. She... her servants... always let me know where the next Drukhari attack would take place."

traits.locale_text: {n}... Ou du moins, tels sont les mots que vous vouliez prononcer. Mais la volonté étrangère qui vous habite vous fait dire toute autre chose :{/n} « C'était le projet de dame Théodora à l'origine. Elle... ses serviteurs... me faisaient toujours savoir à l'avance où se déroulerait la prochaine attaque des Drukharis. »

languages.text: {n}……或者说，这原本是你想说的话。然而，那个侵入你意识的实体却让你说出了截然不同的答复。{/n}“这一切原本都是西奥多拉夫人的计划。她……她的仆人……每次都会告诉我黑暗灵族下次袭击的地点。”
languages.original_text: {n}...Or at least, that is what you wanted to say. However, the alien will makes you say something else entirely:{/n} "It was originally Lady Theodora's plan. She... her servants... always let me know where the next Drukhari attack would take place."

traits.locale_text: {n}……或者说，这原本是你想说的话。然而，那个侵入你意识的实体却让你说出了截然不同的答复。{/n}“这一切原本都是西奥多拉夫人的计划。她……她的仆人……每次都会告诉我黑暗灵族下次袭击的地点。”

languages.text: {n}…少なくとも、あなたはそう言いたかった。しかし、その異質な意志は、あなたにまったく別のことを言わせた。 {/n}「元々はシオドーラ卿の計画でした。彼女が…彼女の従者たちが…私に次のデュカーリの攻撃場所を毎回教えてくれたのです」
languages.original_text: {n}...Or at least, that is what you wanted to say. However, the alien will makes you say something else entirely:{/n} "It was originally Lady Theodora's plan. She... her servants... always let me know where the next Drukhari attack would take place."

traits.locale_text: {n}…少なくとも、あなたはそう言いたかった。しかし、その異質な意志は、あなたにまったく別のことを言わせた。 {/n}「元々はシオドーラ卿の計画でした。彼女が…彼女の従者たちが…私に次のデュカーリの攻撃場所を毎回教えてくれたのです」

languages.text: {n}... Oder zumindest wolltest du das sagen. Aber die fremde Präsenz bringt dich dazu, etwas völlig anderes auszusprechen:{/n} "Es war ganz und gar Lady Theodoras Plan. Sie ... ihre Diener ... gaben mir die Informationen, wo die Drukhari als Nächstes zuschlagen wollten."
languages.original_text: {n}...Or at least, that is what you wanted to say. However, the alien will makes you say something else entirely:{/n} "It was originally Lady Theodora's plan. She... her servants... always let me know where the next Drukhari attack would take place."

traits.locale_text: {n}... Oder zumindest wolltest du das sagen. Aber die fremde Präsenz bringt dich dazu, etwas völlig anderes auszusprechen:{/n} "Es war ganz und gar Lady Theodoras Plan. Sie ... ihre Diener ... gaben mir die Informationen, wo die Drukhari als Nächstes zuschlagen wollten."

languages.text: {n}... o al menos, eso es lo que querías decir. Sin embargo, la voluntad intrusa te obliga a decir otra cosa totalmente distinta:{/n} «Todo fue idea de lady Theodora. Ella... sus sirvientes... siempre me avisaban de dónde iba a ocurrir el siguiente ataque Drukhari».
languages.original_text: {n}...Or at least, that is what you wanted to say. However, the alien will makes you say something else entirely:{/n} "It was originally Lady Theodora's plan. She... her servants... always let me know where the next Drukhari attack would take place."

traits.locale_text: {n}... o al menos, eso es lo que querías decir. Sin embargo, la voluntad intrusa te obliga a decir otra cosa totalmente distinta:{/n} «Todo fue idea de lady Theodora. Ella... sus sirvientes... siempre me avisaban de dónde iba a ocurrir el siguiente ataque Drukhari».

languages.text: {n}...Böyle söylemek istesen de kafandaki yabancı irade sana tamamen farklı bir şey söyletiyor.{/n} "Hepsi aslında Leydi Theodora'nın planıydı. Drukhari saldırılarının meydana geleceği yeri bana o, daha doğrusu onun hizmetkârları söylerdi."
languages.original_text: {n}...Or at least, that is what you wanted to say. However, the alien will makes you say something else entirely:{/n} "It was originally Lady Theodora's plan. She... her servants... always let me know where the next Drukhari attack would take place."

traits.locale_text: {n}En azından söylemek istediğin şey bu ancak kafandaki yabancı irade sana tamamen farklı bir şey söyletiyor:{/n} "Hepsi aslında Leydi Theodora'nın planıydı. Drukhari saldırılarının meydana geleceği yeri bana o, daha doğrusu onun hizmetkârları söylerdi."
